Considering how badly they could have fucked up the anime I'm willing to forgive them.  After the announcement while waiting for the pv I was thinking to myself, "oh god please don't fuck up the animation or the art style!"  Considering all the ways they could have butchered it beyond belief I'm willing to forgive them for voices that don't match the characters.
